description:
Get your bearings and stay headed in the right direction. This no-nonsense compass is great for light hiking, travel, or having in an emergency kit.

  • Dial markings from 0-360-degrees with large numerals at every 20-degree mark, so it's easy to read in challenging conditions
  • 1:25:000 and 1:50:000 scales and centimeter/millimetre rules
  • DryFlex™ rubberized bezel is easy to use with, and without gloves
  • Clear baseplate for easy mapping and plotting
  • Declination scale
name: Silva Compass Field
